attributes.action: I believe Robin Hood tax the banks, Should goto our own NOT the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe Robin Hood tax the banks, Should goto our own NOT the EU.

The EU wants more money from the UK
http://robinhoodtax.org/

I declare this robin-hood tax to go ahead without the EU getting its hands on it.

This money should goto funding UK Growth, the UK does enough already helping other country's its time the government take measures to secure our own peoples future instead of the Euro Dreams..
